product_name: Eagle Creek Tarmac AWD Wheeled Luggage - 30"
long_description: The roomy, extremely durable Tarmac AWD 30 smoothly escorts you and your multi-week travel gear thanks to its four 360 wheels, hybrid construction and convenient travel features.
short_description: The roomy, extremely durable Tarmac AWD 30 smoothly escorts you and your multi-week travel gear thanks to its four 360 wheels, hybrid construction and convenient travel features.
